product-description-content:
Protègenet tradition® is an aluminum window sill specially designed for facade renovations with External Thermal Insulation (ITE). It allows you to recreate the appearance of a traditional support.
Open the product page: Link here
Open photo galery: Gallery
product-description-extra:
Shipping times
(Delivery times subject to available stock – the exact shipping date will be communicated to you after validation of your order)
Delivery time normal: ex factory within 10 working days
Stock colors: ex factory within 5 working days for the following finishes: raw, anodised, lacquered aluminum RAL 1015, 7016, 9010, 9016
CAUTION:
Manufacturing depth: Allow concrete dimension + 30 mm.
Manufacturing length: Allow - 10 mm for the passage of the ends.
quantite-emb: Pairs (1x left + 1x right) of end caps
